settings.text:
At St. Peter’s Fly Shop we always like taking fly fishing to the next level and what better than an exotic fly fishing destination. Whether you want to get a taste for salt water fly fishing in Belize, or maybe a trip to Patagonia, we at St. Peter’s have the gear and the knowledge to serve your destination travel needs.

No matter the location we will do our best to help you with your fly fishing arrangements, and one thing we can guarantee at the shop is that our staff is well traveled and experienced in every facet of destination fly fishing. You may also want to join us on one of our many shop hosted destination trips. Call the shop to check the latest locations and availability, or to let us help you customize the fly fishing trip of your life.

settings.title: Tsimane Lodge, Bolivia
settings.text: Perched on the banks of the Pluma River in the exotic jungle of Bolivia, Tsimane’s Pluma Lodge is the premier location to pursue the incredible Golden Dorado.

settings.title: Cayo Romano, Cuba
settings.text: Located on the northeast shore of the eastern province of Cuba, Cayo Romano (formerly Cayo Cruz) Lodge offers a huge variety of salt water fly fishing.

settings.title: JDR, Avalon 4, Cuba
settings.text: This vast marine park, which is bigger in size than the Florida Keys, is ideal for fly-fisherman who wish to live and experience fishing from dawn till dusk. Here we offer more fishing hours than any other destination.

settings.title: Copal Tree Lodge, Belize
settings.text: Copal Tree Lodge in Punta Gorda, Belize, helped pioneer the ideas of sustainable food production and agritourism—ultimately becoming an award-winning, world-class destination welcoming discerning travelers from around the globe.

settings.title: Ikari House, Christmas Island
settings.text: Amidst the vast inventory of the world’s saltwater flats destinations, Christmas Island is a unique and natural masterpiece that magically combines all the elements critical to fly fishing success.

settings.title: Duncan Camp, Alaska
settings.text: If you've dreamed of catching chrome bright Salmon until your arms ached, this is the place it happens.

settings.title: Spring Creek Lodge, Argentina
settings.text: Argentina’s Northern Patagonia, in the area surrounding Junin and San Martin de los Andes, is without question an anglers dream come true. Boundless trout fishing opportunities exist on its crystal clear rivers, secluded spring creeks and unspoiled mountain lakes.

settings.title: Costa de Cocos, Mexico
settings.text: Costa de Cocos is a wonderful lodge for beginning saltwater anglers to experienced anglers alike. Being further south from populations of people offers endless flats and lagoons that are not nearly as pressured as some of the waters around the Yucatan.
